ch0337_00_corusa/0101_0701_01_10:
Greetings, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You did well to come. I’ve been waiting
for you!
ch0337_00_corusa/0101_0701_02_10:
Time to let our honed senses give birth to a
collaborative work of art!
ch0337_00_corusa/7101_0701_02_10: Art you’ve never imagined is hiding all over!
ch0337_00_corusa/7101_0701_03_10:
My inspiration’s unstoppable! I’m overflowing
with the need to create new art!
ch0337_00_corusa/7102_0701_01_10: Art is everywhere—even in Pokémon battles!
ch0337_00_corusa/7102_0701_02_10:
Which is why we must observe carefully and
hone our eye for beauty!
ch0337_00_corusa/7103_0701_01_10:
This island is so lush and green. It’s hard to
believe it’s artificial.
ch0337_00_corusa/7103_0701_02_10:
Sync pairs create contrast against Pasio’s
backdrop of grandiose nature!
ch0337_00_corusa/7103_0701_03_10:
It makes this island perfect for artistic
expression!
ch0337_00_corusa/7104_0701_01_10:
I am aware of prominent artists from various
regions who have made their way to Pasio.
ch0337_00_corusa/7104_0701_02_10:
But I’ve also been seeing formerly unknown
artists display talent for the avant-garde!
ch0337_00_corusa/7104_0701_03_10: Pasio inspires! It’s the perfect atelier!
ch0337_00_corusa/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I see great
potential in you!
ch0337_00_corusa/7105_0701_02_10:
Your creativity! Your eye for beauty! Your
artistic taste!
ch0337_00_corusa/7105_0701_03_10: Why don’t you visit my atelier sometime?
ch0337_00_corusa/7105_0701_04_10:
Together, let us strive to create a
collaborative masterpiece!
ch0337_00_corusa/1701_0701_01_10:
Impeccable timing. I will bestow this
upon you.
ch0337_00_corusa/1701_0702_01_10:
When you use it, it shall complete a
collaborative work of art between us.
ch0337_00_corusa/2501_0701_01_10:
When I created my signature piece,
Surrendering Sunflora, I was on the
brink of giving up art entirely.
ch0337_00_corusa/2501_0701_02_10:
I had resolved to give up my life as an artist
if that piece did not receive proper
recognition. I was prepared to surrender.
ch0337_00_corusa/2501_0701_03_10:
At the time, I met someone who became my
good friend and life mentor—which led to
me completing that work.
ch0337_00_corusa/2501_0702_01_10:
You can find Surrendering Sunflora in
Artazon, in Paldea.
ch0337_00_corusa/2501_0702_02_10:
If it interests you, do visit. I hope you can
tell me what feelings it sparks in you.
ch0337_00_corusa/2511_0701_01_10:
I was a guest lecturer back at the academy
in Paldea!
ch0337_00_corusa/2511_0701_02_10:
It was a wonderful experience. I saw young
talent bloom before my very eyes.
ch0337_00_corusa/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope the number of youths interested in
art increases...
ch0337_00_corusa/2511_0702_02_10:
until one day, we can talk about art
together!
ch0337_00_corusa/3001_0701_01_10:
At times, art becomes a race against the
clock! Some of it can only be discovered by
those who wake early!
ch0337_00_corusa/3003_0701_01_10:
To finish an artwork is to persist, as plants
do. And like them, be sure to get enough
sunlight and water.
ch0337_00_corusa/3005_0701_01_10:
As if from atop a windmill, I gaze back on
the day now behind me... It was truly
avant-garde!
